description.value:
Also at 3rd level, you always have certain spells prepared after you reach particular levels in this class, as shown in the Alchemist Spells table. These spells count as artificer spells for you, but they do not count against the number of artificer spells you prepare.

Alchemist Spells
Artificer LevelSpells
3rd@UUID[Compendium.materia-dnd.spells.Item.matSplHealingWor]{Healing Word}, @UUID[Compendium.materia-dnd.spells.Item.matSplRayOfSickn]{Ray of Sickness}
5th@UUID[Compendium.materia-dnd.spells.Item.matSplAcidArrow0]{Acid Arrow}, @UUID[Compendium.materia-dnd.spells.Item.WuCsvZ6j3fbKbrDg]{Flaming Sphere}
9th@UUID[Compendium.materia-dnd.spells.Item.matSplGaseousFor]{Gaseous Form}, @UUID[Compendium.materia-dnd.spells.Item.matSplMassHealin]{Mass Healing Word}
13th@UUID[Compendium.materia-dnd.spells.Item.matSplAuraOfPuri]{Aura of Purity}, @UUID[Compendium.materia-dnd.spells.Item.matSplDeathWard0]{Death Ward}
17th@UUID[Compendium.materia-dnd.spells.Item.matSplCloudkill0]{Cloudkill}, @UUID[Compendium.materia-dnd.spells.Item.matSplRaiseDead0]{Raise Dead}
